geninfo.para: The fan hub is mounted to the front cover on DT 466 and International 530 engines. The fan drive (viscous or on/off) mounts to the fan hub. Viscous fan drives use a ball bearing type fan hub. Beginning September 2000, BorgWarner 8000 series air actuated on/off fan clutch feature code 12TKM uses a heavy duty tapered bearing fan hub on the following applications: International 530E engines, DT 466E high torque engines and DT-466E standard torque engines with the front mount PTO option. Always use the heavy duty tapered bearing type fan hubs for air actuated BorgWarner 8000 series fan clutches or Horton EC-450 Electromagnetic fan clutches. To eliminate any confusion, Service Parts provides only the tapered bearing type fan hub.
